thread.title: SenionLab Offers International Insights on LBS Panel at LBMA’s RetailLoco
thread.title_full: SenionLab Offers International Insights on LBS Panel at LBMA’s RetailLoco

author: admin
title: SenionLab Offers International Insights on LBS Panel at LBMA’s RetailLoco
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 3:35 AM Companies mentioned in this article: SenionLab 
LINKÖPING, Sweden -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Marcus Andersson, Vice President of Sales and Marketing at SenionLab , will participate on a panel discussion at RetailLoco , a two-day Chicago-based event sponsored by the Location Based Marketing Association (LBMA). The conference runs from October 22-23, 2015 and will deliver insights and trends on the latest in mobile and location-based tools and techniques for retailers. 
Andersson will speak on a panel entitled, “International Perspectives,” discussing the challenges of selling and implementing location-based services internationally. With SenionLab’s international experience and holistic system approach, Andersson will offer keen insights on the do’s and don’ts of building location-based services around the world. 
“SenionLab is helping shape the global LBS market with our strong IPS foundation,” said Andersson. “I am happy to share our experiences with the LBMA and RetailLoco, providing first-hand knowledge of the methods that transcend cultural differences and improve clients’ workflows with IPS.” RetailLoco Panel Discussion, International Perspectives
